DOC.brief_title: Impact of Therapist Change on Dropout in a Naturalistic Sample of Inpatients With Borderline Pathology Receiving DBT
DOC.criteria: three or more criteria for BPD as defined by DSMIV (Borderline Personality characteristics; BPC) inability to contract and consent, other severe mental disorders (bipolar disorder, acute psychosis), current alcohol, illicit or not prescribed drug use, simultaneous participation in other treatment studies, pregnancy or breastfeeding, an inability to negotiate a nonsuicide agreement, ongoing traumatic contact with the perpetrator, and a Body Mass Index < 16.5.
